HotelElement.Name: Marriott Executive Apartment Sathorn Vista Bangkok

Address.Address1: SATHORN SOI 3 , SOUTH SATHORN ROAD, THUNGMAHAMEK 1

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Sathorn Vista, Bangkok - Marriott Executive Apartments, you'll be centrally located in Bangkok, steps from Embassy of Australia and minutes from Embassy of Malaysia. This 4.5-star serviced apartment is within close proximity of Canadian Embassy and Embassy of Germany.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 186 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and microwaves. Your bed comes with down comforters, and all rooms are furnished with sofa beds. 37-inch LCD televisions with premium TV channels provide entertainment, with wired and wireless Internet access available for a surcharge. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature deep soaking bathtubs and rainfall showerheads.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreational opportunities offered, including an outdoor pool, a sauna, and a 24-hour fitness center.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at a coffee shop/café serving guests of Sathorn Vista, Bangkok - Marriott Executive Apartments. While enjoying a refreshing dip in the serviced apartment pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Bangkok? This serviced apartment has facilities measuring 344 square feet (32 square meters), including a meeting room. Free self parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon

Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
